name: df-bj-2upl
comment: Definition of the Morse couple. See ~ df-bj-1upl . New usage is discouraged because the precise definition is generally unimportant compared to the characteristic properties ~ bj-2upleq , ~ bj-2uplth , ~ bj-2uplex , and the properties of the projections (see ~ df-bj-pr1 and ~ df-bj-pr2 ). (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.)
